Articles.Content: Hello forum, I have been lurking since December or so and feel like I should finally get involved in the community. I have gotten a ton of great advice, inspiration, and many good laughs. Looking forward to contributing my experience and knowledge to the pool here.

Hello CombatWombat9402 and welcome to the forums!

Looking forward to your contribution.

Happy landings!

Combatwombat, eh? Is that like a Navy Seal?

 

Jokes aside, welcome aboard!

Lol no, I am a Veteran but it is actually the name of a plane in a book series by Phillip Reeve called "The Hungry City Chronicles". It is a post apocalyptic world where cites are mobile and big city eats small city etc.  That series is what makes Kerbal Foundries my favorite mod due to its amazing tracks. With it I can create monstrous and mobile tracked bases.

Epic Avatar!  Welcome good lurker....

SM
